item.title: Wait For Setup
item.description: Wait For Setup feature allows to perform actual accessory configuration in bridge on incoming Setup Message. Setup Message structure is: { "nrchkb": { "setup": { ... setup properties goes here } } } In the setup part you may specify properties to configure accessory, such as name, model, manufacturer and other properties available on homekit node. To configure accessory characteristics setup should contain characteristicProperties string JSON representation for Characteristics Properties as seen in homekit node properties page.

item.title: Credits
item.description: This is a place where would like to thank those who have come before to build the work that we have added to. Where the Project came from The API work to interact between HomeKit and NodeJS is from HAP-NodeJS. Marius Schmeding made the first version of the Node-RED plugin to use HAP-NodeJS. His work was later forked by Oliver Rahner who put in a good effort to move over to bridged connections to HomeKit.
